name: Arcade Legend [Game Boy]
description:
Web controls:

Move: ARROWS / WASD

Action: Z / ALT

I have always wanted to leave my mark in the world.

My goal is to get high score on every game in our local game arcade!

I have one month to achieve my dream!

I get allowance from my parents. I can use it to play 3 games every day.

Leaderboards beware!

Here I come!
